DOC.brief_summary: The aim of our study is to compare the different effects of 6 months treatment with extended-release metformin and immediate-release metformin on clinical, endocrine and metabolic parameters in women affected by polycystic ovary syndrome. We also evaluate gastrointestinal disorders associated with the two different compouds.
DOC.brief_title: Extended-release vs Immediate-release Metformin in PCOS Women
DOC.criteria: women with PCOS in accordance with Rotterdam criteria pregnancy diabetes mellitus (or impaired glucose tolerance as determined by a standard 75 gr oral glucose tolerance test) past history of cardiovascular diseases past history of gastrointestinal diseases significant liver or renal dysfunction (hypothalamic, pituitary, thiroidal or adrenal); neoplasms.
